meanings: a surprise attack, a sudden raid[attack], 급격하다 take ((the enemy)) by surprise

vlive.korean: [급격한 현타] 아니 이거 두 번만에 성공했어야 되는 거 아니야? [Sudden realization] Shouldn't we have succeeded in 2 tries? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.2
vlive.english: [Sudden realization] Shouldn't we have succeeded in 2 tries?

vlive.korean: [급격한 다이어트로 인한 부작용] 급격한 다이어트 때문에? Because of a drastic diet? 듣기 View video 뷰티로그(beautylog) : [뷰티로그 1회]관리 만렙! 나르샤의 다이어트 식단!😜
[급격한 컨디션 난조?] - 물 한 번. - 네. [Suddenly feeling bad?] - Drink some water. - Yes. 듣기 View video Golden Child : '울려라! 골든차일드' 4화 ('Ring it! Golden Child' ep.4)
vlive.english: [Suddenly feeling bad?] - Drink some water. - Yes.

vlive.korean: [급격한 심경변화] 이렇게 얘기하니까 잔인하다. [Suddenly becoming emotional] It's too cruel to say. 듣기 View video JBJ : 잘봐줘 JBJ 4화 (Just Be Joyful JBJ EP.4)
vlive.english: [Suddenly becoming emotional] It's too cruel to say.

vlive.korean: [급격한 컨디션 난조가 온 지범] 지금 다들 이 작전이에요. [And he's not feeling well] Everyone has the same strategy. 듣기 View video Golden Child : '울려라! 골든차일드' 4화 ('Ring it! Golden Child' ep.4)
vlive.english: [And he's not feeling well] Everyone has the same strategy.

examples.korean: At this point the path descends steeply. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 지점에서 오솔길이 급격한 내리막길이 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At this point the path descends steeply. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Some addicts suffer violent mood swings if deprived of the drug. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일부 중독자들은 약 기운이 떨어지면 급격한 기분 변화를 겪는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some addicts suffer violent mood swings if deprived of the drug. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The driver slowed down at a tight bend in the road. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 운전자가 도로의 급격한 커브 길에서 속도를 늦추었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The driver slowed down at a tight bend in the road. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The last few weeks have been a real roller coaster. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지난 몇 주 동안에는 정말 정신없이 급격한 변화들이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The last few weeks have been a real roller coaster. Add to Wordbook
